messages.subject: Re: important article
messages.msgSnippet: This article s URL has been posted at another club a couple of times, and its message is so moving, I very much would like to see it pass through the hands of
messages.messageBody:
This article's URL has been posted at another club a couple of times, and
its message is so moving, I very much would like to see it pass through the
hands of every caring individual in every corner of the world.

Please read this, and consider what it means to all humanity. And if you
have access to anyone with the means to pass it to the powers that be, by
all means do so. Not that I believe massive attacks which slaughter still
more innocents are the purpose nor intent of our unilateral move to
eliminate terrorism, but it could perhaps temper the efforts a bit.

http://www.salon.com/news/feature/2001/09/14/afghanistan/
